page.title: 04NEWS AROUND DIPTFORD
page.content: The Parish Magazine is one of the Information Services around Diptford It contains local news. There is a childrens page and it tells you how to make things. It tells us when outings are on and when things are happening. The Vicar produces the Parish Magazine. He is called Father Peter. The School, the Post Office and the Church are the places where people meet to exchange news. People distribute the {Magazine} to all the parishioners. The public {Notice - {Boards}in the area of Diptford are at the Post Office and at the school.Here notices of all events can be easily seen. The school frequently notifies parents and friends of all events through printed{letters}sent home by each child.
